sentences.english: In fact, this tour is the classic red and white hand-shooting game machine small bees.
sentences.chinese: 其实这款手游就是经典红白机射击游戏小蜜蜂。
你是不能阻止我的，小蜜。

sentences.english: So to not to greedy butterfly, only small bees busy all day.
sentences.chinese: 所以招引不来贪心的蝴蝶，只有小蜜蜂整日的忙碌着。
小蜜蜂欧芹草本抗痘露。

sentences.english: I am a busy , happy bee .
sentences.chinese: 我是一只忙碌快乐的小蜜蜂。
请记住，就算是勤劳的小蜜蜂也是要休息的。

sentences.english: A little bee saw them crying.
sentences.chinese: 一只小蜜蜂看到他们在那哭。

sentences.english: The lily smiled at Shandie the bumble bee.
sentences.chinese: 澄色百合花对著小蜜蜂仙蒂微笑著。

sentences.english: Snandie the bumble bee put her nose in the flower and sniffed. They smelled so good!
sentences.chinese: 小蜜蜂仙蒂用她的小鼻子用力的闻著小紫菊花们。

sentences.english: Expect to be quite a busy bee.
sentences.chinese: 准备好做一只忙碌的小蜜蜂吧。

sentences.english: Xiaomi wallpaper is, who are interested in the replacement of every day.
sentences.chinese: 小蜜是桌布，如有兴趣天天更换。

sentences.english: Burt's Bees knows how to make lip balms.
sentences.chinese: 小蜜蜂知道怎么制造很棒的唇膏。

sentences.english: There are many little purple daisy flowers in the glade. Shandie the bumble bee hoped these were sweet flowers.
sentences.chinese: 小蜜蜂仙蒂多么地希望这些是有甜美蜜汁的花儿们。

sentences.english: Buzzy bee flew up to the hill and broke the beehive away from the tree.
sentences.chinese: 嗡嗡小蜜蜂飞上山坡，把蜂巢从树上晃了下来。

definition: (slang) novice/greenhorn/fool/idiot/abbr. for 小白臉|小白脸[xiao3 bai2 lian3], pretty boy
tablet announcing the name of leading actor in a theatrical production/by extension, the lead role
(Internet slang) what? (loanword from Japanese 何 なに nani)
